ResourceHeader.Description:
This data set contains Level 2 flux data from the Relativistic Electron and Proton Telescope integrated little experiment (REPTile)on board the Colorado Student Space Weather Experiment (CSSWE) CubeSat. Electrons and protons are measured in five energy ranges in units of differential flux (number∕MeV∕s∕sr∕cm²)including:
E1: flux for electrons E= 0.5-1.63 MeV E2: flux for electrons E= 1.63-3.8 MeV P1: flux for protons P= 9-18 MeV P2: flux for protons P= 18-30 MeV P3: flux for protons P= 30-40 MeV
Electrons from E3 are measured in units of integral flux (number∕s∕sr∕cm²) for E>3.8 MeV. All flux, in units of number per 6 seconds, have been corrected for transmission and temperature noise. L is calculated using the IGRF magnetic field model. Geographic latitude, longitude and altitude (km) are provided.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the PI and NASA SPDF for the CSSWE REPTile data.

NumericalData.Caveats: Please contact the PI, Xinlin Li (xinlin.li@lasp.colorado.edu) before using these data for publication.
